item.title: Officers conducting a welfare check find 5 people dead in Indiana home
item.description: Police conducting a welfare check have discovered five people dead inside a home in northwest Indiana

item.title: 'See you in court': Trump clashes with Democratic governor at White House event
item.description: At a White House event with a bipartisan group of governors Friday, President Donald Trump briefly sparred with Democratic Maine Gov. Janet Mills.

item.title: WATCH: 5-year-old plays Uno with family dog: 'Got you, Kev!'

item.title: Menendez brothers case: DA asks court to deny their petition for new trial
item.description: Los Angeles County District Attorney Nathan Hochman said he's asked the court to deny the Menendez brothers' habeas corpus petition.
